mapper.select: select nsc.node_id nodeId, nsc.original_status originalStatus, nsc.target_status targetStatus, nsc.node_condition nodeCondition, nsc.rule_user_id ruleUserId, nsc.update_field updateField from t_process_node_action na LEFT JOIN t_process_node_status_condition nsc on na.node_status_condition_id =nsc.id ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
